member.summary: Initializes a by using the description of the data collector.
member.param: Description of the diagnostic data adapter or resource name that contains the description.

true to indicate that the string that is provided for the description is a resource name; false to indicate that the string that is provided should be used directly as the description for the data collector.

member.summary: Gets the description of the diagnostic data adapter.
member.returns: A string that contains the description of the diagnostic data adapter.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.Execution.DataCollectorDescriptionAttribute.IsResourceName
member.summary: Indicates whether the string that is provided for the description is a resource name or the actual description for the diagnostic data adapter.
member.returns: true if the provided string for the description is a resource name;false if the provided string should be used directly as the description for the diagnostic data adapter.

member.summary: Designates that the diagnostic data adapter class is enabled by default when the adapter is listed in the Test Manager user interface (UI).

member.summary: Initializes an instance of the class, which is enabled by default.

member.summary: Initializes an instance of the class by using the provided value to determine whether the adapter is enabled by default.
member.param: true to enable the collector by default; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.Execution.DataCollectorEnabledByDefaultAttribute.IsEnabledByDefault
member.summary: Gets or sets the enabled-by-default state.
member.returns: A bool value that indicates whether the diagnostic data adapter is enabled by default.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.Execution.DataCollectorFriendlyNameAttribute
member.summary: Defines a friendly name for the diagnostic data adapter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.Execution.DataCollectorFriendlyNameAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes an instance of the class with the friendly name and indicates whether the string is a resource name.
member.param: Friendly name of the diagnostic data adapter or resource name that contains the friendly name.

true indicates that the string that is provided for the friendly name is a resource name. false indicates that the string that is provided should be used directly as the friendly name for the adapter.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.Execution.DataCollectorFriendlyNameAttribute.FriendlyName
member.summary: Gets the user-friendly name for the diagnostic data adapter.
member.returns: A string that contains the user-friendly name for the collector.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.Execution.DataCollectorFriendlyNameAttribute.IsResourceName
member.summary: Gets the value that indicates whether the friendly name is a resource name.
member.returns: A bool value that indicates whether the provided string for the friendly name is a resource name. A value of false indicates that the provided string should be used directly as the friendly name for the data collector; otherwise, the friendly name is extracted from a resource that depends on the current language setting.

member.summary: This method is called before a test starts.
member.returns: true if the agent should continue to run the test; false if the agent should not run the test.NoteWhen false is returned, the agent assumes that the plug-in reported a test failure for that test and does not record a result. Even when false is returned, the plug-in will still raise a event for that test.
member.param: An object that represents the context for the test.
The test ID.
